action_output_list: The user wants to check storage and cache usage of an app. This can be done through app settings. To get to app settings, first open settings.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Settings"}
The goal is to check app storage and cache, so the next step is to open the "Apps" section.{"action_type": "click", "index": 36}
